entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:27 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 12:20 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: SW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon then becoming west 20 gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
